style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 37.05%;top: 33.18%;width: 5.25%;height: 2.68%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius:45%;font-weight: normal;

text:
ありがと
ラリベラ
さん!
style: font-size: 12px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 21.90%;top: 75.18%;width: 7.16%;height: 3.94%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 10%;font-weight: normal;

text:
途中の街の広場で
今夜お祭りあるけど
行かないの?
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 32.64%;top: 60.00%;width: 15.99%;height: 8.38%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius:40%;font-weight: normal;

text:
できれば
行きたいけど
ぼくらの分も
見てよ!
